MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground electricity cable fault in the area and due to the extent of the repairs required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 1am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:23pm on Tuesday, 09 March 2021
